website_summaries.verdict: A small, well-made machine with a budget price that competitors can't beat.
pros: Compact, affordable machine that works just like its larger, costlier counterparts
cons: Lacks the output of larger machines, but candy is flavorful and fluffy

customer_reviews.title: Assembles and disassembles perfectly, works like a dream..
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with more cones. Other than that, it was easily assembled and disassembled, and works like a dream, though there's a learning curve to making cotton candy stick to the cones right. Even heavily textured, the plastic cones provided were hard to coat. I recommend buying paper cones. Also, the area to roll up cotton candy is small, be careful to not hit the sugar hopper. It turns any hard candy or flavored sugar into cotton candy, though I highly recommend butterscotch candies for a most delicious twist. I'd give it a 5 if it had more cones and they worked better with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lee E. Walkowski

customer_reviews.title: I thought I might have been doing it wrong but I watched videos and it worked fine for them
customer_reviews.text: The one I got was already used. I don't remember if I ordered a used one for a discount? It had a sticker that said "inspected". And still had some sticky candy on it. I thought I might have been doing it wrong but I watched videos and it worked fine for them. But mine was taking so long to even start webbing. And took forever to even get anything on the stick. I tried cleaning it like it says on the instructions. Still the same. I ended returning it. I was pretty bummed that I couldn't use it at my daughter's party...
customer_reviews.author: Verna

customer_reviews.title: Little more, than a easy bake oven.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a disappointment. Don't waste your money. It takes 10 minutes to make a TINY stick of cotton candy. It takes forever to heat up, then overheats quickly! I read many reviews before buying it. Many people said it was a good machine. They must of got a different unit than I did. I ordered it for vacation, along with 2 other similar snack machines, snow cones and yogurt maker. I didn't use it right away, saving it for the trip. I only used it 1 night, and now it's to late to return. I never return things. but its frustrating and I wish I knew what happened. It's little more, than a childs, easy bake oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Does vibrate sometimes depending on what's in it. We tried it with floss sugar, life savers, candy canes, butterscotch, werthers originals, and pure cane sugar. All worked really well. No flying sugar, just a little buildup around the edge of the pink part of the bowl. We have used it 3 times and it is really fun to do. Some flavors seem to produce more than others like pineapple life savers make quite a bit but the cherry not as much. Werthers originals don't make a lot but it taste really good. Peppermint seemed to make a lot, and table sugar made it almost faster than we could collect it! Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work...
customer_reviews.text: We assembled the unit and it wouldn't work. We took the whole unit apart and started from the beginning again. It must be the machine because we did everything by the book/manual. Sure would have liked to use it for the kids....would be a lot of fun. Customer support - feel free to contact me and maybe with your expertise, we can get it to work properly or exchange for another unit. Signed - The Ultimate Optimist :-)
customer_reviews.author: John Hardy

customer_reviews.title: This machine WILL NOT work
customer_reviews.text: Won't melt anything. Return window is cleverly short enough to make sure you can't return it if it doesn't work so I'm out the cost of this item and it's worthless. Also made sure I spent $30 in flossing sugar that we can't use either. Thanks a bunch.
customer_reviews.author: M Murray

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy small batch maker for the kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble right out of the box. Kiddo thought the sugar threads forming were magical! I was impressed with how safe it felt to work around (obviously kids need close supervision-it’s heated sugar!) Clean up was fast. Each batch is pretty small -as expected for a small table top unit. There did seem to be more sugar waste than I would have expected - a ring of sugar forms around the inside of the bowl. Can pull off crush and re-use. Clean up was quick and straightforward. Bought the flavored Nostalgia sugar set with extra holders for a fun small kid group activity.
customer_reviews.author: MT, Philly Metro Area

customer_reviews.title: Used it 2 times so far got 2 really good sticks of cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: I had this at a 5 star rating but wow not anymore. Only used 4 times and it is now not working so I will have to find another one because my little one really was loving it. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: This was disappointing. We had to use it outside ...
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing. We had to use it outside because the sugar flies everywhere. It's quite messy. I read all of the other reviews before purchasing and gave it a shot. I read the other reviews saying how to use the cones to get the most cotton candy,etc. However, we never really got a decent size cone of cotton candy. It made more of a mess than it did cotton candy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, made a ton in my first attempt
customer_reviews.text: I let my machine heat for a full 20 minutes before starting. I had never done this before, and I found it very easy to figure out. My first attempt looked like a big wiener, but the next three were nice big balls of cotton candy. I did all four in a row, one for each kid, without letting it cool in between or having to clean it. I think I could have kept going, I had no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Netland

customer_reviews.title: This is Awful.
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Just awful! This does NOT work well with floss sugar. We followed the instructions to a T and got almost no cotton candy. In the second batch, we let it warm up for 15 minutes like other reviewers said. Still, no good. This is really a joke. If you want cotton candy easily and readily, just go buy it from the store or get a commercial grade. After 5 hours, we only got about three handfuls. It just kept melting the sugar around the edges. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cotton Candy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make special treats for my kids. It takes 10-15 minutes to heat up but after that we make a good sized cotton candy within 5 minutes. I like that we can use Hard Candy but it is very sticky and melts back to being hard quickly. I did not have flossing sugar right away so we used regular sugar and it was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: But the amount of cotton candy this thing produces is disproportionate to the hassle and how stinking long it takes to make a sad little amount of cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: We don't even use this. We can handle the heat up time. But the amount of cotton candy this thing produces is disproportionate to the hassle and how stinking long it takes to make a sad little amount of cotton candy. Also, the candy hardens and turns into a hard crust around the rim of the machine that causes a need for frequent cleaning out, pretty much between each cone. I tried to give it away and nobody wanted it after seeing the hassle of use.
customer_reviews.author: Angie L.

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Go for it
customer_reviews.text: Well was a little iffy at first. I received it and tried it right away. AWESOME! Just follow the instruction. I let it heat up for 12 min then turned it off, let it stop pour i scoop of sugar, turned it on right away and just let it to its job. It will take a little over a minute for it to start webbing but its awesome. FLUFFY AND GREAT SIZE! I would use i scoop per cone.
customer_reviews.author: Luri

customer_reviews.title: Makes delicious cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! It makes yummy cotton candy and the kids enjoy watching it work. My only complaint is how much it vibrates, causing it to move across my counter. I have to hold the machine in place with my left hand to keep it from falling off the counter, while using my right hand to turn the cone to collect the cotton candy. It's just annoying that I have to hold onto the machine to keep it in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for fluffy cotton candy every time!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my daughter and she loves it! Easy to use, quiet and works great. We bought the floss sugars which are yummy but she also crushed peppermint candies and that worked perfectly. Like others have said - the key is letting it warm up first. We did 20 minutes and that seemed just right. Good quality especially for the price so I hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: superglew

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine for small parties or to make at home for the kids. Wouldn't recommend it you want to make a large quantity. Takes about 10 minutes to heat up and once you have some you need to clean the outside off otherwise the cotton candy gets chunky. Definitely a learning experience at first until you figure out what way works best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Leezer

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it, my kids really enjoy it! If you twirl the cone side ways. It makes your cotton candy ball much larger!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake product..I bought this product happily for my neice in india when today she called me saying that he tried several plugs and converter but this won’t jusy start..this feels so embarrassing like i gave her a wrong product on her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Supervise young children, always remeber to clean out the head when finnished
customer_reviews.text: The first one i bought was used it broke the first day i was very unhappy. After a second buy this is the best thing i have gotten in awhile. My son loves it not to mention my older children. You can you any hard candies which i think is great there fav is jolly ranchers i love the green apple is so sour but i really like sour stuff. You can also use the flossing sugar if you would like. Really is a great product and i would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessyann

customer_reviews.title: Sooo good!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loves this! She wanted this for her birthday, and has been using it at least once a week. The cotten candy is incredible! They love using mint and cinnamon candy. My favourite is the jolly ranchers. Nice and tangy! Doesn't taste like you're just eating a spoonful of sugar, like with your basic cotten candy!
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: never got it to work as described
customer_reviews.text: could never get this to work properly. called manufacturer and they told us we must be doing it wrong. had friends try it also and they couldn't get it to work. bought all the extra flavor packs and spindles but really just a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wall

customer_reviews.title: works but could be better
customer_reviews.text: it works but I really do not like the plastic bowl design, it should have been metal of some kind. I can feel the plastic heats up really bad and I can see it melt over time. Also the design of the input of sugar floss is not a lot so it takes a long time to get one filling of cotton candy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: The first one we received started up and immediately died, so we sent it back for a replacement. The second one arrived and worked very well. It's important to read and follow the instructions carefully in order to achieve the desired results. We've been able to spin some very large cones from it, but it definitely took some practice to figure out which candies worked best and how to spin the cone to get it nice and fluffy. We also tried sugar floss, which works really well and our own sugar flavor mixes. Don't expect a professional, carnival machine in this price-range, but for home use it's great and easy to use once you overcome the small learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Bin

customer_reviews.title: This is really great! I got it for my 8 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really great! I got it for my 8 year old son and he operated it while I was at work all by himself (my husband was supposedly supervising from the couch while watching football). The most impressive thing (that I didn't even realize when purchasing) is you can throw hard candies in there and it melts them down and spits out cotton candy! So he just used whatever we had around the house and made cotton candy instead of me having to buy the fancy sugar! Very cool! The one I bought for my sister about a decade ago did not have this feature at all. Very easy to wash as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Marquardt

customer_reviews.title: My kids and I favorite machine
customer_reviews.text: In love with this machine super easy to use. Got it it for my daughters party and the kids loved that we had our own cotton candy. Definitely recommend getting this machine
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: A kid or two, not a party.
customer_reviews.text: Cost wasn’t too outrageous, but I should’ve just rented a machine again. This does not fluff quick enough or make ample clouds of cotton candy. Followed instructions explicitly and barely could get one full stick.
customer_reviews.author: Danie

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Home cotton candy maker
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my granddaughter for her birthday. We just tried it out for the first time today. It was a lot of fun. It took a couple of rounds to get used to how to collect the cotton candy onto the cone. Once we got the hang of it, we had a great time . Also some reports complained about noisiness. It wasn’t noisy at all. Also it was very easy to clean, just a little soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: ERF

customer_reviews.title: We Couldn't Be Happier!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't be happier with this purchase! A cotton candy machine was one of the things on my 10-year old daughter's Christmas list, so I came on Amazon & read customer reviews & ended up picking this one. We're so happy with it. You can have it up & running (instructions read & know what you're doing) within 5 minutes. After the 10-minute warm-up period for the machine, you can have yummy cotton candy within minutes. Then you can make more of them them back-to-back at that point because the machine is already warmed up. It's so simple, we succeeded on the first try. I can't wait to have her friends over ... this is going to be a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: ) and we were pretty pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this last Thanksgiving (doesn't everyone have cotton candy at Thanksgiving?) and we were pretty pleased with it. Once the machine is on and heated up (a few minutes), depending on what type of powder you pour in, you'll have your 'poof' in about a minute or two. Plain sugar worked the quickest. If you're going to crush up other hard candies (we used Life Savers and Creme Savers), we crushed them with a mortar and pestle and measured out the powder with the scoop provided with the machine. We had consistent results doing it that way rather than just putting whole candies in the top.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Little to no cotton candy☹️
customer_reviews.text: This cotton candy machine was a disappointment. It only produces a very small amount of cotton candy when using hard candies and little to nothing when using flossing sugar. It seems though the machine being plastic doesn’t get hot enough quick enough to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This machine was easy too use... I do think that using sugar is better than hard candy. It makes a decent amount of cotton candy (don’t expect as much as at a carnival.) it’s not that easy to clean, and you have to really clean it very well before you put it away.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Do more.......
customer_reviews.text: I might be rushing things but my only problem with this is it doesn't do enough cotton candy at one time but other than that it tastes better than the cotton candy in the store
customer_reviews.author: Mom Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Made my daughter birthday extra special.
customer_reviews.text: I really am happy with this product. The only one thing is that the sugar spinning wheel will definitely get stuck and you have to pull it out with everything you got or having hot water run first until its loose.And hopefully don't break it.
customer_reviews.author: Lh

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this machine for about a year and a half now, and we love it. Very easy to clean, mostly easy to use, you just have to get the hang of it. Needs an adult to supervise unless the kids are around 12 or older I would say. It does get hot. Works very well with Jolly Ranches and peppermints. It also works with candy floss; however, it takes about 3 times as long for the candy floss to melt as it does for jolly ranchers. Overall good product!
customer_reviews.author: Mobear26

customer_reviews.title: Cotton candy perfection so easy
customer_reviews.text: This cotton candy maker is so easy to use. First try was perfection. Just read the directions. Heat it, turn it off, add cotton candy mix, turn it back on. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it worked great. Made a lot of cotton candy with each ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay I got this for my step daughter. The first time we used it, it worked great. Made a lot of cotton candy with each poor of cotton candy rocks. Using other things like jolly ranchers and such do not produce as much cotton candy. The more often we used the machine I felt it was producing less and less cotton candy, even though it was cleaned after each use. However, the kids thoroughly enjoyed it and for the price it is much better than hiring someone for a party. Im wondering if we may be doing something wrong for it to not be making as much.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cologne

customer_reviews.title: Great for playdates!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter bought this with her Christmas gift money. I am always leery about specialty food making machines because we have definitely been burned in the past. The kids loved this! We have only done it once, but found that floss sugar, Werther's originals, and starlight mints work great! Definitely read the instructions - important to let it warm up first because it forms the cotton candy much quicker. Also important to clean it well (not hard if done as soon as its cool). I do agree with other reviewers that it does take time, so small numbers works better. can't wait to try other flavor combos!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Michelle

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This did not work the way I thought it would. The cotton candy does not stay fluffy on the stick because the moment it touches the middle it falls down. I would just spend the extra money and invest in a good one...you definitely get what u pay for with this machine. Although my kids did enjoy the idea of having a cotton candy machine this was not the right one! Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: kaleena

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine based on all of the positive reviews. We tried using it on at least two occasions. First- we were never able to get the full cotton candy on the cone as it is displayed in the photo. It was not even a third of that. And second- I will repeat another review here in that it sprayed candy dust on the floor and counter tops surrounding it. I used the candy floss both times. It was relatively easy to clean and is small enough to store. But definitely not useful in party situations where kids are expecting a lot of cotton candy in a very short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: So much fun! Our first arrived not working right due to ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Our first arrived not working right due to the part that spins being lopsided. Quickly got a replacement and turned candy canes and dum dums into delicious cotton candy. Not quite the same as you would get from a larger machine at a carnival but my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Cotton Candy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and the kids loved it. Its a great way to get rid of candy canes after Christmas. We have used the peppermint and Jolly Rancher flavored ones. There is a little technique to get the perfect looking cotton candy stick, but follow the directions and after using it a couple of times, you will get the perfect looking cotton candy. Heat is the #1 key to achieving this, so give it plenty of preheat time, and have your candy ready to go. It makes a softball size ball with 2 pieces of hard candy. Hot water dissolves the candy, making cleanup very easy. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Only a handful of floss with any materials
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Easy set up. Can’t get more than a handful of floss after trying every evening. My friend has experience with selling cotton candy etc and had no better success Very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Fran Farmer

customer_reviews.title: I was like a kid all over again
customer_reviews.text: I was like a kid all over again! Sugar takes a while to melt and spin into cotton but it was fun! Hey what can you expect for the price you pay!
customer_reviews.author: okidoki1313

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to make batches of cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: A few thoughts on this: 1) The Extractor Head needs to be spotless. It's extremely difficult to clean. 2) If the Extractor Head is spotless, it will work. For one serving. If there's more than one person in your family that would like cotton candy at the same time, do not purchase this machine. 3) I would recommend paying extra money to get a more durable cotton candy machine. In this case, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele M

customer_reviews.title: This cotton candy maker is fantastic!! We previously bought a different brand at ...
customer_reviews.text: This cotton candy maker is fantastic!! We previously bought a different brand at a toy store, and it broke within a week. Replaced it with this model, and couldn't be happier with it. The kids love that you can use any hard candies with it (regular table sugar works too), and we have used it many times with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Its more about the event than the result
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to bring back those childhood memories as well as make new ones for your small children or grandchildren. The unit makes great cotton candy, just not in commercial machine quantities. Be prepared to spend some time spinning the cotton candy. With a ten minute warm-up before getting started, the unit works as advertised. It just takes time to produce the results. This will keep the kids entertained for a while. The process is simple and only one switch to operate. Clean-up is easy. The surprise is that after use, a ring of sugar forms around the edge of the bowl and creates something akin to rock candy to eat after you are done.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eure

customer_reviews.title: The real thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for the holidays and we made our first cotton candy the other night. PROS: 1) The real thing. Tastes just like the cotton candy we loved as a kid at the carnivals/fairs 2) Easy to clean up 3) Good value for the price CONS: 1) Even with pre-heating, it is slow and the flosss comes out in waves as it melts 2) Small portions (but who wants to buy a $500 huge machine?) 3) My machine shifts on the countertop from wobble as the machine spins, so, be careful as there is a hot element. Was definitely worth it and is fun to do with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: S&H

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use.. But doesn’t make a lot (obviously) and is hard to clean. It makes it hard to use because it seems like it’s not worth taking the time to clean. I really like it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Howerton

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons birthday, he saw someone on YouTube use it. It’s so fun but I feel as though the spinner is off center but it still works. It jiggles quite a bit and lots of sugar gets crusted up in the sides after one use (we go with it and call them “unicorn toenails” and Eat them).
customer_reviews.author: Russ’

customer_reviews.title: Adults and kids love it. Teaches science and candy making.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love. Does not make it fast. Which is good if you don’t want them eating too much. If you want a lot of candy fast you need a real event industry size. This is great for a few kids at a time, not a big party.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Ive been making crazy flavored cotton candy! Yall gotta put 4 werthers originals in this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Whalin

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and easy.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Works great and easy for a five year old. Off course you need and have to closely supervise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cotton candy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at xmas for my daughter a couple of years back and it worked and still works great. Easy assembly and easy for kids to operate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bessent

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I love buying items in amazon. I was so Disappoint when I got it it looked in good condition. Once I started using it it took forever to heat up plus every 25 minutes it made a Cotten candy. I took this to church for movie night, felt so bad I was only able to make 6!!!! Within the two hours never again will I order this or recommend. Read the comments they fooled me :(
customer_reviews.author: Christina Campos

customer_reviews.title: Works great for small batches.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters party and it worked perfectly. Fresh cotton candy is yummy. No, it will not produce as much cotton candy as a $200 machine. But, as long as you have patience (for the sugar to heat up) and clean it after each use, the machines works great. I noticed that after 10-12 balls of cotton candy, that the machine needed to be cleaned, which takes about 10 minutes. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Houstonian1

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy, but only used a couple times a year.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a hit when we use it, but it takes some practice and it does make a mess. Don't expect to be able to make the large puffs of cotton candy on a cone that you see at the carnival. To make them that large take a very long time with this thing and very easy to hit the spun candy on the heat element in the middle. So, it's a fun toy that we use a couple of times each year, but not something I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is a blast!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is a blast! We're making fluffy delicious cotton candy using only 2 pieces of hard candy per serving. It heats up fast and clean up of the maching is very fast and easy. I do have to agree with another reviewer who complained about floss flying in the air - it does. But it's easy enough to clean up with a dry cloth. I've also found the included plastic cones are too big and cumbersome, but a wooden chopstick works great for wrapping the floss. I was concerned about finding somewhere to store this machine, but it looks like it's going to be used too often to worry about storage. I give this a huge recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: momtwice

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to operate and very little candy for the time spent spinning the cone.Kids grew to hate it and I definitely do because I spent my very hard earned money on a product that kinda works
customer_reviews.author: Preston Coilsup

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Our machine works great we have tried both hard candy and the cotton candy sugar they sell here on Amazon and it works great with both. We are very happy with our purchase and would recommend to anyone looking for one for their family. The best advice I can give is let it warm up for at least 5 minutes like the instructions say and be patient when learning how to collect the cotton candy as it come out.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C

customer_reviews.title: Great present for those who love cotton candy- Works great
customer_reviews.text: My kids and husband love cotton candy. We used to buy it in the local store for $6.00 a container that would last for about 15 minutes in our house. This provides unlimited amount of cotton candy and you can choose your own flavors. Any hard candy, sugar or sugar free will work. Crush up and place in the machine. You can use floss sugar as well.
customer_reviews.author: Faith M

customer_reviews.title: Used and sticky
customer_reviews.text: After paying for one day delivery the box arrived on time BUT the cotton candy maker arrived used and was still sticky with candy! We are SO disappointed!! Who would do something like this? We are returning it.
customer_reviews.author: nojirigirl

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC littke machine!
customer_reviews.text: I am sooooo happy with this little machine! I took it on its maiden voyage uesterday to a little event at our church. I enjoyed making cotton cany for several kids and adults! They LOVED it! It does take a while (3ish minutes) to get a nice large wad of cotton candy and several scoops of sugar but for my even it worked great cause everyone got halfsizes sitcks! I am excited to try the hard candy option and have some jolly rancher cotton candy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... couple years ago for my older daughter and she loved it! now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a couple years ago for my older daughter and she loved it! now, as the youngest one is growing up she's enjoying it as well! I love the machine, the only thing i'd advice is for an adult to be next to children when they're using it, as it gets really hot and they may burn themselves. Also, the cleaning process is a little bit demanding, as sugar gets stick on the heat platform. Other than that, if you're looking forward a cheap cotton candy this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Small cones - but fun
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I knew they would be small cones - but I had not anticipated how small. A few bites. It takes some skill to twirl it correctly too. Maybe as I get better, I'll get more floss on the cone - but I doubt that it will significantly increase. The kids love it - but they do get impatient waiting. By the time I have one made, the other kid has already eaten their cone and has been waiting for more, because you just can't get enough on a cone at one time. Again, kids love it and it worked well with the floss sugar.
customer_reviews.author: 4mom

customer_reviews.title: Our grandchildren loved watching us make the cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren loved watching us make the cotton candy. We started with the sugar we purchased, but we then tried the hard candy. We used root beer hard candy and strawberry hard candy. Turned out great. Made really good sized cotton candy on the card board handles. I would say this machine performs nicely. The trick is letting the machine warm up as directions state.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Too slow
customer_reviews.text: Would have been great if it would make product in any Timely fashion. Easy to use but it took forever to make one very small cotton candy cone. Probably about 25 minutes or maybe more. I should have timed it to be exact but when kids are waiting excitedly anything more than 10 minutes is way too long. And this is for every one not just the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Surprised how well this works
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect much for this low price, but it works surprisingly well. We found it works better with hard candy than with flossing sugar. Cleaning the head can be difficult, but it does clean well with effort. Very fun time with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical upon purchasing but it did a good job at making cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical upon purchasing but it did a good job at making cotton candy. Watch some of the other reviewer's videos that have tips on how to get the best cotton candy. I followed their advice and it worked really well!
customer_reviews.author: Gina_Gail

customer_reviews.title: More Difficult to use than you would expect
customer_reviews.text: It spins the cotton but difficult to master the art of proper removal. if you dont get it right, you will end up with dirty tray full of candy to clean up rather than cotton on your stick. Managed a few golfball size results, ended up buying cotton candy at the grocery and sticking it on the sticks i had purchased for this. i believe it will work but its going to take you a few hours or longer to figure it out and several cleans and redos in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Jones

customer_reviews.title: we love it
customer_reviews.text: Fun to have. Works great the only con's is how long it takes to heat up and the sugar tends to collect on the sides. My whole family loves it we use it at family functions and its a hit twitch the kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Tasty fun.
customer_reviews.text: Very user friendly. My 11 year old loves it. Candy is tasty and fluffy. Sugar floss works better than hard candy. If you use hard candy (we used sour jelly ranchers) crush as fine as you can.
customer_reviews.author: Ktnunna

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!  NON-RETURNABLE ITEM FROM AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't make cotton candy - it melt and stuck in the machine instead
customer_reviews.author: Lilian Love

customer_reviews.title: Not a great experience...
customer_reviews.text: I received it with missing parts... Not a good experience....
customer_reviews.author: 🐆🍃AmazonPrincess🍃🐅

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love cotton candy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great. Not exactly cranking it out like my little guy wanted (there were big plans to start a cotton candy business after watching cotton candy artist on YouTube) but enough sugar fun for all and their friends think it is the coolest.
customer_reviews.author: rekab

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy and the cotton candy brought memories of being ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy and the cotton candy brought memories of being a kid at the fair. Now my granddaughter make one for me and it delights her to see me eating her creations. Happy grandma :-) The clean up is worth the efforts,
customer_reviews.author: Glow

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected at all.
customer_reviews.text: Took way to long to start up cotton candy and made a huge mess. Took multiple attempts and it still took forever definitely not practical.
customer_reviews.author: JFlores

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't tried the hard candies, this little gem is awesome and makes perfectly fluffy and delicious cotton candy when you use sugar floss! It's super easy to use and clean. I bought the pink one which was perfect and adorable for my friends baby shower! I will update once I use the hard candies and let you know how that goes..
customer_reviews.author: RitsyJack

customer_reviews.title: Did the job well
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our block party and it did the job! We made about 20 cotton candies and they turned out well. We only used the cotton candy sugars, we didn't try any hard candy, so not sure how well it does with that. We did have to knock off a sugar ring a couple of times, but it was quick and easy to do. Overall a great purchase considering it costs less than renting a machine for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It's really fun to play with but it takes a lot to learn how to do it well. Also, it can be very messy, so be prepared to scrape shards of hard candy off any surfaces and clothing. Overall though, it would be fun for a kid's party, but don't expect the type of cotton candy you might buy pre-made.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well, do not overload the tray
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well, do not overload the tray, it will take longer to heat, spit lots of crap out to the sides and give you a poor experience. rather put a half scoop at a time in and watch it floss pretty nicely for a small low yield unit. My kids love it and it's easy to clean. We used it with some of the candies and like others it comes out in a rush at first for some of them. Overall I would recommend it. The star off is for the slow/low yield.
customer_reviews.author: Koplin

customer_reviews.title: OH SO GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The secret is letting it get real hot first. I have it on for 10 minutes before starting. Once you are in the zone it's magical. Scraping the sides is also fun....we call it Fairy dust! It's obviously not professional grade but you do get delicious cotton candy. It's amazing. You can even mix hard candy flavors for amazing tastes no fair has!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mahour

customer_reviews.title: Not quality
customer_reviews.text: Did work as expected. Machine made a lot of noise. Wound up throwing it away
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Graham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome birthday gift :)
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little time to get the swing of it but once you do its a lot of fun . we bought flossing sugar and have found some work better than others , the longer you leave it on the faster it comes out . my son asked for it for his birthday and LOVES it .
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Cotton Candy Maker
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old daughter wanted this for Christmas. When we got it we were surprised that there was no candy or sugar to come with box. So we had to use flavored candy canes and plain sugar. You do have to master getting cotton candy on the cones. It is a little difficult and you have to be quick. At four she did pretty well. Just wish it had candy or sugar and paper cones as well. We had a house full during Christmas and everybody wanted some. It only came with two cones.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product
customer_reviews.text: We love this. At christmas we crush peppermint candy and make peppermont cotton candy. It is so good. Works really well. Just let it get hot enough. Next we will try rootbeer candy. We are very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is a fun machine, as long as you have help by ...
customer_reviews.text: The reasons this product did not get a 5 star rating is,,,,,the clear plastic top does not "snap" on to the bowl. Once the machine gets going it vibrates quite a bit and rattles the clear top right off!! For the price it is a fun machine, as long as you have help by holding the cover on and keeping the machine from jumping off the counter!! I tried baskin Robbins sugar free candy,,,it did not work. We also purchased the cotton candy floss sugar,,,works perfectly ,,nice fluffy candy.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing! I had to wait over 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing! I had to wait over 30 minutes for it to heat up and it made barely enough cotton candy for one serving.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I’m dramatic but this is THE BEST THING I HAVE EVER PURCHASED. I agree on the other reviews saying to leave it warming up for a while(30 min). I used jolly ranchers but I have floss sugar on the way! LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Regular white sugar works beautifully! Cool machine. Don't expect a lot of output for your time though. Takes several minutes to make ONE cone of fluff! Still awesome. Maybe all the waiting will cut down on the diabetes??
customer_reviews.author: Brandess Sorrels

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE THE HARD CANDY OPTION
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was in complete shock when she opened it, she dramatically collapsed over the box. We LOVE THE HARD CANDY OPTION!!!! I purchased the flossing sugar but the container is still pretty full. The flavors from the hard candies are AMAZING. We've used Jolly Ranchers and Candy canes - sour fruit flavored, so far. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Weidman

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean and produces great cotton candy using sugar floss. I am afraid to try the hard candy.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda W.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: we have had this a few months now and it works great. took a bit to get the hang of it but fairly easy. it does work with candy but the cotton candy it gritty. works best with the floss sugar. I do worry about the long haul of this. it is hard to pull apart to soak the pieces. it takes a bit of force to pull apart and wonder if it will make it through that abuse. but for now a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Only a taste of cotton candy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't make anywhere near a respectable cotton candy cone. I had it for a kids birthday party and billed it as, "Have a taste of cotton candy" because that's about all you will get out of it. If I had it to do over I would have just rented a larger cotton candy maker. It did make cotton candy and it wasn't too difficult to operate or clean. The capacity is just really really small.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kretkowski

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for 1 or 2 at a time, but not for multiple people in a jiffy
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't that hard to use like other reviewers said. But, you do have to follow the directions to a tee. Also, it takes a little bit to make 1, so if you have multiple people wanting one, no too practical for that.
customer_reviews.author: KevinMS

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 3 and 4 year old for christmas. They loved it! The heating happened quickly and before you know it, we had cotton candy. Few things....the middle section where you pour the sugar in, we had a lot of problems cleaning out after we were done, the sugar was so hardened in there. Also, make sure to buy a pack of floss sugar if you want to make cotton candy right away, we didn't have hard candy on hand, so the sugar kit really was helpful especially since the kids wanted cotton candy right away! I think this is why I didn't have to wait as long for it to heat up. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. It takeas a while to start really producing. For the price I can’t complain. Skittles make good cotton candy and melt faster than the floss sugar.
customer_reviews.author: miT

customer_reviews.title: and it works GREAT, seriously we were amazed at how much cotton ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my granddaughter, and it works GREAT, seriously we were amazed at how much cotton candy she could make...I like the fact that y ou can use hard candy with it not just their crystals that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: luvn UK comedy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST 30.00 I have ever spent. The product works great and my son and I have had so much fun using it. I normally don't write reviews but had to on this one. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon White

customer_reviews.title: cool little machine but when I started mixing hard candy
customer_reviews.text: cool little machine but when I started mixing hard candy, it blew into the air and got small particles of candy all over the kitchen. i guess its more of an outdoor machine..
customer_reviews.author: Tw

product_meta.title: Nostalgia PCM805 Hard & Sugar-Free Candy Cotton Candy Maker
product_meta.description: Style:PinkBring the carnival right into your kitchen by creating fluffy, melt-in-your-mouth cotton candy. Use your favorite hard candies or flossing sugar To create a fluffy cotton candy cones The whole family will love. The clear rim acts as a protective guard and allows for easy viewing of the cotton candy. The unit includes 2-reusable cones, 1-Sugar scoop, and 1-extractor head.
feature_bullets: Flossing sugar or hard candies - unique Extractor head allows you to use traditional flossing sugar or your favorite hard candies to make delicious cotton candy
Cotton Candy kits - this unit works perfectly with any Nostalgia cotton candy kit - try the cotton candy flossing sugar (Ccfs300), or the hard candy party kit (Hck800)
Simple operation - warm up the unit, add your flossing sugar, and enjoy your cotton candy in just a few short minutes!
Retro design - This unit has retro design and details that will bring you back to the time of record-spinning jukeboxes and American muscle cars
Clear rim guard - acts as a protective guard and lets you watch the cotton candy being made
Accessories - Includes 2 Reusable Cones, 1 sugar scoop, and 1 Extractor head
Easy cleaning - unit disassembles for easy cleaning
Extra stability - suction cup feet keep the unit in place and provide extra stability during use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,527 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
